koalas.name: Basic Koala
koalas.description: Just a chill guy looking to get hired

koalas.name: Application Koala 1
koalas.description: 10 apps! You are on the right track! Maybe one of them will be the one but in the meantime, keep applying!

koalas.name: Application Koala 2
koalas.description: 25 apps! Koalas make tree-mendous climbers! Keep going up!

koalas.name: Application Koala 3
koalas.description: 50 apps! OHHH WE'RE HALFWAY THERE! OH-OH, LIVIN ON A PRAYER! KEEP APPLYING YOU'LL MAKE IT, I SWEAR!

koalas.name: Application Koala 4
koalas.description: 100 APPS! YOU DID IT! YOU'RE A LEGEND! YOU'RE A ROCKSTAR! YOU'RE A KOALASTAR! KOALASTARS KEEP APPLYING! KOALASTARS GET HIRED!

koalas.name: Interview Koala 1
koalas.description: Your First Interview! Keep calm and Koala on!

koalas.name: Interview Koala 2
koalas.description: 5 Interviews! Here's a little koala Haiku! Soft eucalyptus, Dreaming trees cradle my rest, Stillness conquers storms. Let the calm and resilience of the koala inspire you to carry on. üê®

koalas.name: Interview Koala 3
koalas.description: 10 interviews! Go ahead and show them you're KOALAFIED for the job!

koalas.name: Offer Koala
koalas.description: OMG YOU DID IT! YOU REALLY DID IT! NOT A LOT OF PEOPLE DO IT BUT YOU DID IT! DO YOU EVEN KNOW WHAT YOU'VE DONE! YOU JUST KOALAFIED FOR THE JOB! CONGRATS! King Koala is so proud of you!
